程序包 frogger.controller

类 ScoreListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • frogger.controller.ScoreListController
  • public class ScoreListController
extends java.lang.Object

    ScoreListController

    The ScoreListController class is a controller for Score List scene

    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Wenzheng Shan
    另请参阅:
    SceneSwitch, Score, ScoreListReader

      The list of score list shown on the screen
      private java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> scoreList
      The list of score list read from file

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      (专用程序包) void backToHome​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Called when the home Button is clicked and show the start screen.
      (专用程序包) void exitGame​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Called when the exit Button is clicked and exit the program.
      void initialize()
      This method is called when the scene is initialized.
      (专用程序包) void restartGame​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Called when the restart Button is clicked and show the select screen.
      java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> sortScoreList​(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> scoreList)
      This method will sort the input scoreList in descending order (by comparing the Score value) and return the sorted scoreList.

    • 字段详细资料

      • listView

        private javafx.scene.control.ListView<java.lang.String> listView
        The list of score list shown on the screen

      • scoreList

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ScoreListController

        public ScoreListController()

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public void initialize()

        This method is called when the scene is initialized.

        This method called ScoreListReader read the score list from file and call the sortScoreList(LinkedHashMap) to sort the score list in descending order. In addition, the method also renders the result after sorting into listView.

      • backToHome

        void backToHome​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

        Called when the home Button is clicked and show the start screen.

        参数:
        event - The Button click event

      • restartGame

        void restartGame​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

        Called when the restart Button is clicked and show the select screen.

        参数:
        event - The Button click event

      • exitGame

        void exitGame​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

        Called when the exit Button is clicked and exit the program.

        参数:
        event - The Button click event

      • sortScoreList

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> sortScoreList​(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Score> scoreList)

        This method will sort the input scoreList in descending order (by comparing the Score value) and return the sorted scoreList.

        参数:
        scoreList - Unsorted socreList
        返回:
        Sorted socreList in descending order
